snippet: A man shot six people across two communities and, according to officials, barricaded himself in a building after firing at police officers.
abstract: Four people are shot and killed at two businesses in Upstate New York; authorities are searching for Kurt Myers, who they say set fire to his apartment building in Mohawk, NY, before going on shooting rampage.

byline.original: By JAMIE LARSON and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Jamie Larson reported from Herkimer, N.Y., and Marc Santora from New York. Reporting was contributed by Priyanka Borpujari, Elizabeth A. Harris, Patrick McGeehan and William K. Rashbaum from New York, and Dennis Gaffney from Mohawk, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: A man shot six people across two communities and, according to officials, barricaded himself in a building after firing at police officers.

headline.seo: Man Who Fatally Shot 4 in Upstate New York Is Killed by Police
headline.main: Man Sought in Upstate Shootings Is Killed
headline.print_headline: 4 Fatally Shot in Upstate New York; Police Search for the Killer
